name: nfl-bad-boys
description: The most up-to-date collection of NFL players' crime history

scripts.build: parcel build client/src/index.js client/src/index.html client/src/styles.css -o bundle.js -d client/dist --no-source-maps
scripts.dev: parcel client/src/index.js client/src/index.html client/src/styles.css -o bundle.js -d client/dist --no-source-maps

author: JRC
